item.title: Never Do it for Free
item.description:
This was legendary quote given by “The Joker” in the movie The Dark Knight.

I was never a fan of this quote, until, I realized “The Joker” parted the right message, not for all cases but Yes this quote does hold true for certain instances.

Choose your students wisely. :P
